Title: The Darkest Hour
Writer: Jon Spaihts (screenplay), Leslie Bohem (story), M.T. Ahern (story), Jon Spaihts (story)
Actors: Emile Hirsch, Olivia Thirlby, Max Minghella, Rachael Taylor
Plot: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.
Production: Jacobson Company, New Regency Pictures, Bazelevs Production
